page.content: want more amenities on holiday stay here because they have comfortable beds and the houses usually have a TV downstairs with a bar for the residents. Some of these places are expensive but most are reasonably priced from around Â£7 to Â£10 per person. They provide people who do not wish to stay in a caravan with an acceptable alternative. There are many commercial leisure facilities away from the pier. With the development of the marina beyond the survey area water sports will be added to these. There is also an attempt to attract people on boating holidays to the town. This expansion in Walton's tourism in the past years has greatly increased its economy, causing a multiplier effect in associated services.
